entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
